meanings.sent1: I learned about shiatzus in my massage therapy class.
meanings.sent2: The shiatzus at the spa help relieve muscle tension.
meanings.sent3: The shiatzus decided to form a team to give massages together.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like shiatzus, easing the knots in my back.
meanings.sent5: The shiatzus' touch was gentle yet effective in relaxing my muscles.

meanings.definition: Shiatzus: a breed of toy dog of Chinese origin with a long flowing coat and a short muzzle
meanings.sent1: My neighbor has two adorable shiatzus that love to play in the park.
meanings.sent2: The shiatzus in the dog show looked elegant with their silky fur.
meanings.sent3: The shiatzus' fluffy coats make them look like little walking clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her shiatzus' eyes sparkled like precious gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The shiatzus' playful barks echoed through the neighborhood.
